scripts.clean-dev: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm build && pnpm dev
scripts.lint-fix: turbo lint --continue -- --fix && manypkg fix && pnpm format-fix
scripts.lint-prune: ! ts-prune | grep -v "used in module" | grep -v rpc | grep -v observable | grep -v http | grep -v __fixtures__ | grep -v __generated__
scripts.clean: find . -name node_modules -o -name .turbo -o -name .next -o -name dist -o -name __generated__ -type d -prune | xargs rm -rf
scripts.link-all: cd packages/server && cd ../server && pnpm link --global && cd ../client && pnpm link --global && cd ../react-query && pnpm link --global && cd ../next && pnpm link --global
scripts.current-branch: echo "$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)" | sed -E 's/refs\/heads\///' | sed -E 's/\W|_/-/g' | sed -e 's/\//-/'
scripts.publish-prerelease: pnpm install && lerna publish prerelease --force-publish --dist-tag next --no-push && sleep 60 && git push --follow-tags
scripts.merge-main: git checkout main && git pull && git checkout next && git pull && git checkout -b next-merge-$(date '+%Y-%m-%d--%H-%M') next && git merge --ff main
